basics.name: Martina Bharthi Priya
basics.label: Business analyst and entrepreneur
basics.summary: 15+ years of experience, including managing large-scale transformationprograms and projects for global clients, leading cross-functional teams, andoptimizing performance for multinational firms. Highly adaptable with strongcultural awareness

work.name: Circle strategy SAS
work.summary: My role as a senior strategy consultant involved advising on major transformation projects for an FMCG client, as well as contributing to client acquisition through proposal development, liaising with business schools for recruitment, and organizing conferences.

work.name: P3 France SARL (Subsidiary of P3 Group, Germany)
work.summary: As a senior strategy consultant, I provided guidance on major transformation projects for clients in the automotive industry. I assisted P3 France's growth by taking on finance responsibilities.

work.name: Mercedes Benz Research and Development India (Subsidiary of Mercedes Benz AG)
work.summary: Managed a large team (around 40 members) on different projects

work.name: Cùram Software (now part of Merative, IBM)
work.summary: Delivered essential child support functionalities in social security software, facilitating testing.

work.name: Keane, an NTT Data company
work.summary: Delivered essential pharmaceutical functionalities in healthcare, facilitating business requirements gathering and testing.

references.name: Maxime Van  Steenberghe, Partner, Circle Strategy
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working with Martina at Circle Strategy. Martina's great client management and projet involvement are real assets when working with her. I wish you all the best in your next career step !

references.name: Baharan Faure - Muret, International Engineering Senior Manager, Renault
references.reference: It’s my pleasure to recommend Martina, a brilliant senior strategy consultant. I've worked closely with her over the past year, on a strategic and complex transformation project. Martina showed excellent communication skills and consistently exceeded company quotas. On a personal level, she is charismatic and well-spoken, both qualities that have served her well in her role as a transformation agent...

references.name: Tino Müller, Managing Director, P3 France SARL
references.reference: Martina Bharthi Priya adapts quickly to different projects and challenges, and works both independently and as part of a team. Martina Bharthi Priya puts a lot of effort into every assignment she is given. She particularly enjoys strategic projects and has taken on these challenges with extraordinary enthusiasm.

references.name: Ankit Agarwal, Director - Head of Service Delivery @Monsterlab, Germany
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working alongside Martina for close to 8 years. She is a highly dedicated individual who follows through on every task that she undertakes with all her might. She is one of the most adept individuals at managing relationships and stakeholders I have ever come across. She supplements this with an in depth practical knowledge of managing large scale projects proficiently. As a leader Martina earns my highest recommendation and would add value to any activity she takes on.

references.name: Satish Narasimhan , Line manager, NTT Data
references.reference: Martina worked as a Tester, in one of the largest reverse engineering project I managed. She is a very talented, sincere, dedicated and a smart resource. Within a short time she understood the features of the existing product. Her detailed Analysis, product knowledge and good communication skills made the development team turn to her to get clarifications on the functionality of the product. Based on this impressive performance i asked her to take on the Business Analyst role in the project. She did an excellent job even in that role, though she did not have any prior experience playing this role. A resource you can depend up on in your team.
